Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,-2,0,-1).
formula: There's an obvious formula for the n-th term!
a(n+2) is the Hankel transform of A086622(n+1). - _Paul Barry_, Nov 06 2007
E.g.f.: sin(x)*(1+x)=x*Q(0); Q(k)=1+x/(1-x/(x-2*(k+1)*(2k+3)/Q(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Nov 18 2011
program: (PARI) A009531(n) = (((n^(n+1)) % (n+1)) * ((-1)^((n-1)\2))); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 02 2017, after _Henry Bottomley_'s formula.
(PARI) A009531(n) = (lift(Mod(n, n+1)^(n+1)) * ((-1)^((n-1)\2))); \\ (like above, but quicker) - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 02 2017
